name: RabiesImmuneGlobulinRXNORM
title: Rabies Immune Globulin (RXNORM)
description:
All prescribable medication formulations represented using either a "generic" or "brand-specific" concept. This includes RxNorm codes whose Term Type is SCD (semantic clinical drug), SBD (semantic brand drug),  GPCK (generic pack), or BPCK (brand pack).
SCDG (semantic clinical drug group), SBDG (semantic brand drug group), SCDF (semantic clinical drug form), IN (ingredient) or SBDF (semantic brand drug form) are NOT included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for prescribable medications for Rabies immune globulin.),(Data Element Scope: Medications that were administered, ordered or prescribed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Rabies immune globulin),(Exclusion Criteria: SBDG (semantic brand drug group), SCDF (semantic clinical drug form), or SBDF (semantic brand drug form))
